title: Classic Margherita Pizza
instructions:
1. Roll out pizza dough.
2. Spread tomato sauce.
3. Top with mozzarella slices.
4. Bake until crust is golden and cheese melts.
5. Sprinkle torn basil leaves, drizzle olive oil, season.

title: Creamy Garlic Mashed Potatoes
instructions:
1. Peel and chop potatoes, boil until tender.
2. Sauté minced garlic in butter.
3. Mash potatoes, add butter, cream, salt, and pepper.
4. Whip until creamy and smooth.
5. Garnish with chives.

title: Thai Red Curry
instructions:
1. Heat coconut milk, add red curry paste.
2. Add chicken/tofu, cook until done.
3. Add sliced vegetables and bamboo shoots.
4. Season with fish sauce and sugar.
5. Garnish with torn basil leaves.
6. Serve over jasmine rice.

title: Caprese Salad
instructions:
1. Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
2. Arrange in alternating layers.
3. Tuck in fresh basil leaves.
4. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil.
5. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Homestyle Beef Stew
instructions:
1. Coat beef in flour, brown in a pot.
2. Sauté onions and garlic.
3. Add beef, broth, wine, herbs.
4. Simmer for hours until beef is tender.
5. Add diced potatoes and carrots.
6. Season and cook until vegetables are soft.

title: Lemon Herb Grilled Salmon
instructions:
1. Preheat grill to medium-high.
2. Drizzle olive oil on salmon.
3. Sprinkle garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
4. Grill salmon until cooked, about 4-5 minutes per side.
5. Squeeze lemon juice, garnish with herbs.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions:
1. Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
2. While the spaghetti cooks, sauté the guanciale until crispy.
3. In a bowl, whisk eggs, Pecorino cheese, salt, and pepper.
4. Drain the pasta and quickly toss with the egg mixture.
5. Mix in the guanciale and parsley.
6. Serve immediately.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fried Noodles
instructions:
1. Cook rice noodles according to package.
2. Sauté garlic and ginger.
3. Add vegetables, cook until tender.
4. Toss in drained noodles.
5. Mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, and hoisin sauce.
6. Pour sauce over noodles, stir-fry.
7. Drizzle with sesame oil, garnish with green onions.

title: Homemade Chocolate Brownies
instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Melt butter, mix with sugar.
3. Beat in eggs and vanilla.
4. In a separate bowl, mix flour, cocoa, salt.
5. Combine wet and dry ingredients.
6. Fold in chocolate chips and nuts.
7. Pour into a greased baking pan.
8. Bake for 25-30 minutes.
9. Let cool before cutting.

title: Mango Salsa
instructions:
1. Dice mangoes, onion, bell pepper.
2. Remove jalapeno seeds, finely chop.
3. Combine all ingredients.
4. Squeeze lime juice, season with salt.
5. Mix well and refrigerate.
6. Serve with tortilla chips or grilled meats.
